fields.title: Additional Slots Per Strength
fields.description: Number of slots that this entity can gain per extra strength

fields.title: Can Be Siphoned From
fields.description: If true, the contents of this inventory can be removed by a hopper

fields.title: Container Type
fields.description: Type of container this entity has. Can be horse, minecart_chest, chest_boat, minecart_hopper, inventory, container or hopper

fields.title: Inventory Size
fields.description: Number of slots the container has

fields.title: Private
fields.description: If true, the entity will not drop its inventory on death

fields.title: Restrict To Owner
fields.description: If true, the entity's inventory can only be accessed by its owner or itself
